1609

THE SONNETS

 Wllm Shkee



                     1
  From f cru  de nce,
  Th  uy' roe mgh n de,
  Bu   r hould   decee,
  H ender r mgh r  my:
  Bu hou nrced o ne  brgh eye,
  Feed' hy lgh' fl wh elf-ubnl fuel,
  Mkng  fmne w bdnce le,
  Thy elf hy foe, o hy  elf oo cruel:
  Thou h r w  wld' fh nn,
  And ly rld o  gudy prng,
  Wn ne  bud bu hy nen,
  And ender churl mk'  n nggng:
    Py  wld,    glu ,
    To   wld' due,   grve nd e.


                     2
  Wn y wner hll e hy brow,
  And dg deep nc n hy uy' feld,
  Thy yh' proud l o gzed  w,
  Wll   ed ed  mll wh ld:  
  Tn ng ked, w ll hy uy le,
  W ll  u  hy luy dy;
  To y wn ne  deep ken eye,
  We n ll-ng h, nd hrf pre.
  How   pre deerved hy uy' ue,
  If hou uld nr 'T fr cld  mne
  Shll um  , nd mke   cue'
  Provng  uy  ucce ne.
    T  o   mde wn hou r ,
    And ee hy blood wrm wn hou feel'  ld.


                     3
  Lo n hy gl nd ell  fce hou ve,
  Now    h fce hould m r,
  Whoe fh pr f w hou  e,
  Thou  gule  wld, b o mor.
  F w   o fr e ed womb
  Ddn  llge  hy hubndry?
  Or    o fd wll   omb,
  Of  elf-love o op poery?  
  Thou r hy mor' gl nd  n e
  Cll bck  lovely Aprl  r pr,
  So hou hrough wnw  ne ge hl ee,
  Depe  wrnkle  hy lden .
    Bu f hou lve md  o ,
    De ngle nd ne mge de wh e.


                     4
  Unhrfy lovelne   hou pend,
  Up hy elf hy uy' lcy?
  Nu'   ng  h lend,
  And ng frnk  lend o hoe  fe:
  Tn ueou ngg   hou bue,
  T boeou lrge  e o gve?
  Pr uur   hou ue
  So gr  um  um y cn  lve?
  F hvng rffc wh hy elf le,
  Thou  hy elf hy  elf  deceve,
  Tn  wn nu cll e o  ne,
  Wh ccepble ud cn hou leve?  
    Thy ued uy   omd wh e,
    Wch ued lve h' ecu o .


                     5
  Thoe h h wh genle wk  fr
  T lovely gze w y eye h dll
  Wll ply  yrn o   ,
  And h fr wch frly h cel:
  F n-ng  led umr 
  To deou wner nd nfod m ,
  Sp ccked wh fro nd luy leve que ne,
  Beuy o'er-d nd bne y w:
  Tn   umr' dll lef
  A lqud prer pen n wll  gl,
  Beuy' effec wh uy  f,
  N  r  mbrnce wh  w.
    Bu flor dlled hough y wh wner ,
    Leee  r , r ubnce ll lve .


                     6  
  Tn l  wner' rgged hnd defce,
  In e hy umr e hou  dlled:
  Mke  o vl; u hou o plce,
  Wh uy' u e   elf-klled:
  Th ue   bdden uury,
  Wch hppe hoe h py  wllng l;
  Th'  hy elf o bed r e,
  Or en  hp   en  e,
  Ten  hy elf  hp hn hou r,
  If en  ne en  fgud e:
  Tn wh uld dh  f hou hould depr,
  Levng e lvng n poery?
    Be  elf-wlled  hou r  oo fr,
    To  dh' n nd mke wm ne r.


                     7
  Lo n  en wn  grcou lgh
  Lf   burnng d, ech der eye
  Doh homge o  -png gh,
  Servng wh   cd mjey,  
  And hvng clmd  eep- hly ll,
  Reemblng rg yh n  mddle ge,
  Y ml    uy ll,
  Aendng   lden plgrmge:
  Bu wn  gh pch wh ry cr,
  Lke feeble ge  elh   dy,
  T eye (e dueou) w nvered 
  From  low rc nd  r wy:
    So hou, hy elf -ng n hy :
    Uned  de  hou g  .


                     8
  Muc o r,  r' hou muc dly?
  S wh  wr , joy delgh n joy:
  Why lov' hou h wch hou cev'  gldly,
  Or  cev' wh pleu ne ny?
  If  rue n  ll-ed od,
  By  mrd  fend ne er,
  Ty   ly cde e,  nfod
  In nglene  pr h hou hould r:  
  Mrk  e rng  hubnd o r,
  Srke ech n ech  muul derng;
  Reemblng , nd cld, nd hppy mor,
  Who ll n e, e pleng e  ng:
    Whoe peech g ng mny, eemng e,
    Sng  o e, 'Thou ngle wl prove ne'.


                     9
  I   fer o w  ww' eye,
  Th hou num' hy elf n ngle lfe?
  Ah, f hou ue hl hp o de,
  T wld wll wl e lke  mke wfe,
  T wld wll  hy ww nd ll ep,
  Th hou  m  e h lef nd,
  Wn y prve ww ll  ,
  By cldn' eye, r hubnd' hpe n mnd:
  Lo wh n hrf n  wld h pend
  Sf   plce,  ll  wld enjoy ;
  Bu uy'  hh n  wld n end,
  And  ued  uer o deroy :  
    No love ow or n h boom 
    Th  melf uch mu'rou h mm.


                     10
  F h deny h hou r' love o ny
  Who  hy elf r o provden.
  Grn f hou wl, hou r loved  mny,
  Bu h hou ne lov'   evden:
  F hou r o poeed wh mu'rou he,
  Th 'gn hy elf hou ck'  o np,
  Seekng h ueou ro o re
  Wch o pr hould  hy cef de:
  O chnge hy h, h I  chnge  mnd,
  Shll he  fr lodged hn genle love?
  Be  hy pence  grcou nd knd,
  Or o hy elf   knd-red prove,
    Mke e r elf  love  ,
    Th uy ll  lve n ne  e.


                     11  
  A f  hou hl wne o f hou grow',
  In e  ne,  h wch hou depre,
  And h fh blood wch yogly hou ow',
  Thou  cll ne, wn hou  yh nvere,
  Hen lve wm, uy, nd nce,
  Wh  folly, ge, nd ld decy,
  If ll  mnded o,   hould cee,
  And he yer  mke  wld wy:
  L hoe m nu hh  mde  e,
  Hrh, fu, nd rude, brnly h:
  Lo m   end,  gve e ;
  Wch boeou gf hou hould n boy crh:
    S crved e  r el, nd n ,
    Thou hould prn ,  l h py de.


                     12
  Wn I    clock h ell  ,
  And ee  brve dy k n deou ngh,
  Wn I h  vol p pr,
  And ble curl ll lved o'er wh :  
  Wn ly e I ee brn  leve,
  Wch er  h  cpy  
  And umr' gen ll ged  n ve
  Bne   ber wh  nd brly :
  Tn  hy uy  I  mke
  Th hou mg      ,
  Snce  nd ue  melve ke,
  And de  f  y ee or grow,
    And ng 'gn T' cy cn mke defence
    Sve bed o brve m, wn  ke e nce.


                     13
  O h   y elf,  love  
  No lger y, hn  y elf  lve,
  Agn  mng end  hould pp,
  And y  emblnce o o or gve.
  So hould h uy wch  h n lee
  Fnd  dermn, n  
  Y elf gn fer y elf' decee,
  Wn y  ue y  m hould r.  
  Who l o fr  houe fll o decy,
  Wch hubndry n h mgh h,
  Agn   gu  wner' dy
  And brn rge  dh' ernl ld?
    O ne  hrf, der  love  ,
    You hd  fr, l y  y o.


                     14
  No   r  I  judgen pluck,
  And y mnk I hve ro,
  Bu  o ell  od,  evl luck,
  Of plgue,  derh,  e' quly,
  N cn I e o  mnue ell;
  Png o ech  hder, rn nd wnd,
  Or y wh prnce f  hll  ll
  By  pdc h I n h fnd.
  Bu  ne eye  ledge I derve,
  And nn r n m I d uch r
  A ruh nd uy hll ogr hrve
  If  hy elf, o e hou  nver:  
    Or   e  I progce,
    Thy end  ruh' nd uy' om nd de.


                     15
  Wn I nder y ng h grow
  H n fec   lle m.
  Th  huge ge penh ugh  
  W  r n ecr nfluence mn.
  Wn I ceve h n  pln nce,
  Ced nd ccked    elf- ky:
  V n r yhful p,  h dece,
  And r r brve e   my.
  Tn  nce   nnn y,
  S   rch n yh e  gh,
  W ful  debh wh decy
  To chnge y dy  yh o ulled ngh,
    And ll n wr wh T  love  ,
    A  ke  , I engrf  .


                     16  
  Bu      mgher wy
  Mke wr   bloody yrn T?
  And fy y elf n y decy
  Wh n  bed hn  brn rhy?
  Now nd    op  hppy h,
  And mny mden gen y ,
  Wh vruou wh  r  lvng flor,
  Much lker hn y pned erfe:
  So hould  lne  lfe h lfe pr
  Wch  (T' pencl)   pl pen
  N n nw wh r w fr
  Cn mke  lve y elf n eye  n.
    To gve wy y elf,  y elf ll,
    And   lve drwn  y   kll.


                     17
  Who wll leve  vere n  o 
  If   flled wh y  gh deer?
  Though y h       omb
  Wch de y lfe, nd   hlf y pr:  
  If I uld wre  uy  y eye,
  And n fh numr numr ll y grce,
  T ge o   y  po le,
  Such hly ouc ne'er oucd erhly fce.
  So hould  p (yellod wh r ge)
  Be rned, lke  n   ruh hn gue,
  And y rue rgh  e  po' rge,
  And rcd m  n n g.
    Bu  o cld  y lve h ,
    You hould lve wce n , nd n  rhy.


                     18
  Shll I mp e o  umr' dy?
  Thou r  lovely nd  eme:
  Rough wnd  hke  drlng bud  My,
  And umr' lee hh ll oo h  de:
  Som oo ho  eye  h ne,
  And en   ld mpl dmd,
  And y fr  fr om declne,
  By chnce,  nu' chngng ure rmd:  
  Bu hy ernl umr hll  fde,
  N loe poe  h fr hou ow',
  N hll dh brg hou wnd' n  hde,
  Wn n ernl lne o  hou grow',
    So lg  n cn br  eye cn ee,
    So lg lve , nd   lfe o e.


                     19
  Devng T bl hou  l' pw,
  And mke  erh dev r   brood,
  Pluck  keen eh   ferce ger' jw,
  And burn  lg-lved phoenx, n r blood,
  Mke gld nd ry e  hou fle',
  And  whe'er hou wl wf-fooed T
  To  wde wld nd ll r fdng :
  Bu I bd e e  u cr,
  O crve  wh hy h  love' fr brow,
  N drw  lne  wh ne n pen,
  Hm n hy ure ned  llow,
  F uy' pern o ucceedng n.  
    Y  hy w  T:  hy wrg,
    My love hll n  vere  lve yog.


                     20
  A womn' fce wh nu'  hnd pned,
  H hou  mer m   p,
  A womn' genle r   cqed
  Wh fng chnge   fle w' f,
  An eye  brgh hn r,  fle n rollng:
  Gldng  objec w  gzh,
  A mn n hue ll hue n  nrollng,
  Wch el n' eye nd w' oul mzh.
  And   womn r hou  cd,
  Tll nu   wr e fell -ng,
  And  dd   e defed,
  By ddng e ng o  purpoe ng.
    Bu nce  prcked e   w' pleu,
    Mne  hy love nd hy love' ue r u.


                     21  
  So    wh   wh h mue,
  Srd   pned uy o  vere,
  Who h  elf  nn h ue,
  And y fr wh  fr h re,
  Mkng  len  proud mp
  Wh  nd mo, wh erh nd e' rch gem:
  Wh Aprl' -bn flor nd ll ng r,
  Th h' r n  huge u m.
  O l  rue n love  ruly wre,
  And n leve ,  love   fr,
  A ny mor' cld, hough  o brgh
  A hoe ld cndle fxed n h' r:
    L m y  h lke  ry ll,
    I wll  pre h purpoe  o ell.


                     22
  My gl hll  ude  I m ,
  So lg  yh nd hou   e de,
  Bu wn n e ' furrow I h,
  Tn  I dh  dy hould pe.  
  F ll h uy h h ver e,
  I   eemly rn   r,
  Wch n hy b h lve,  ne n ,
  How cn I n  elder hn hou r?
  O e love   hyelf o wry,
  A I    elf,   e wll,
  Berng hy r wch I wll  o chry
  A ender nure r b  frng ll.
    Pu   hy r wn mne  ln,
    Thou gv'  ne  o gve bck gn.


                     23
  A n fec c   ge,
  Who wh  fer  pu de  pr,
  Or o ferce ng ple wh oo  rge,
  Whoe ngh' bdnce ken   r;
  So I  fer  ru, g o y,
  T fec cemy  love' re,
  And n mne  love' ngh eem o decy,
  O'erchrged wh burn  mne  love' mgh:  
  O l    n  elonce,
  And dumb pger   pekng b,
  Who pled  love, nd   mpene,
  Me hn h gue h  hh  ped.
    O lern o d wh len love hh wr,
    To r wh eye lg o love' fne w.


                     24
  Mne eye hh plyed  pner nd hh elled,
  Thy uy' m n ble   r,
  My body   fr wn ' ld,
  And pecve    pner' r.

ACT III. SCENE 1.
Flence. T DUKE' plce

ACT_3|SC_1
                     ACT III. SCENE I.
                     A pln n Syr

       Ener VENTIDIUS,    n rumph, wh SILIUS

    S hh puru'd nclu nfne
    Of ey wy o de. Tke  r d,
    And r r w   m.
    S hll  bud  r Any;
    No grve   erh hll clp n 
    A pr o fmou. Hgh   e
    Srke hoe h mke m; nd r y 
    No  n py hn  gly wch
    Br m o  lned. Our r hll
    In olemn  end  ferl,
    And n o Ro. Co, Dolll, ee
    Hgh der n  gr olemny.                   Exe


THE END

ACT IV. SCENE I.

ACT V. SCENE I.
Brn. T Romn cmp

    Bu h  folly u .                          Ex.
  Kng. L' follow, Gerrude.  
    How  I hd o  o clm  rge I
    Now fer I  wll gve  r gn;
    Te l' follow.

SCENE II.

Wemner. T plce

ACT V. SCENE I.

EPILOGUE
                           EPILOGUE.

  Fr  fer, n  cury, l  peech. My fer,  y
dpleu;  cury,  duy; nd  peech, o g y prn.
If     od peech w,   ;  wh I hve o y
  mne  mkng; nd wh, ndeed, I hould y wll, I ub,
prove mne  mrrng. Bu o  purpoe, nd o o  venu.
Be  n o ,     ll, I w lely  n  end
  dpleng ply, o pry y pence   nd o prome 
 er. I n, ndeed, o py  wh ; wch f lke n
ll venu   luckly ho, I bk, nd ,  genle
cd, loe. He I prom'd  I  , nd  I mm
 body o y rce. Be  o, nd I wll py  o, nd,
  deb , prome  nfnely; nd o I kneel wn e
- , ndeed, o pry   Queen.
  If  gue cn enr  o cqu , wll  mmnd  o
ue  l? And y h   lgh pyn-o dnce  
y deb. Bu  od ncence wll mke ny poble
fc, nd o  I. All  genlew  hve 
. If  genlen wll , n  genlen   ge wh
 genlew, wch w n een e n uch n embly.
  One wd , I eech . If    oo  cloy'd wh f
m,  humble uh wll nnue  y, wh Sr Jn n
, nd mke  rry wh fr Krne  Frnce; w, 
nyng I , Flff hll de   w,  ldy ' 
klled wh y h opn;  Oldcle ded  mryr nd 
   mn. My gue  ry; wn  l  oo, I wll bd
 od ngh.


THE END

    Self-love,  le,   o vle  n
    A elf-nlecng.

ACT IV. PROLOGUE.

Ener CHORUS

    So edouly wy. T po ndemned Englh,

Frnce. T FRENCH KING'S plce

    Gr Kng  Frnce nd Englnd! Th I hve lb'd
    Wh ll  w,  pn, nd rg endev,
    To brng y  ml Mjee

    Th fce o fce nd royl eye o eye
    You hve nged, l   dgrce 
    If I demnd, e  royl vew,
    Wh rub  wh mpedn

    Should  n   gen   wld,

    Al,  hh  Frnce oo lg en ch'd!
    And ll r hubndry h le  p,
    Crng n   ferly.
    Her vne,  rry cer   r,
    Unpred de; r dge -plech'd,
    Lke prer wldly gr wh r,
    Pu h dder'd wg; r fllow le

    Ty cll'd u,   fercene, Englh g;
    Now lke o wlp  cryng r wy.

                               SCENE 4.

ACT IV. SCENE I.
T   Ken

    I cp no  boom   e;

    Trouble  lver prng w Englnd drnk;

    F wllg  u   lm.
    Thy lp, h k'd  Queen, hll ep  grod;

ACT III. SCENE I.
A che n  rh  Englnd

Ener wo KEEPERS, wh cro-bow n r hnd

  FIRST KEEPER. Under  ck-gr brke 'll hroud elve,
    F hrough  ld n  deer wll ;
    And n  ver wll  mke  nd,
    Cullng  prncpl  ll  deer.
  SECOND KEEPER. I'll y bove  ll, o   hoo.
  FIRST KEEPER. Th cn ;  e  hy cro-bow
    Wll c  , nd o  hoo  lo.
    He nd  , nd m    ;
    And,    hll  eem edou,
    I'll ell e wh fell    dy
    In  elf-plce w w  n o nd.
  SECOND KEEPER. He   mn; l' y ll   p.

        Ener KING HENRY, dgued, wh  pryer-bo

  KING HENRY. From Slnd m I ol'n,   pu love,
    To g mne  lnd wh  whful gh.  
    No, Hrry, Hrry, '  lnd  ne;
    Thy plce  fll'd, hy cep wrg  e,
    Thy blm wh'd f wwh hou w ned.
    No ndng knee wll cll e Cer w,
    No humble u p o pek  rgh,
    No,   mn   d  e;
    F  cn I lp m nd  elf?
  FIRST KEEPER. Ay, '  deer e kn'  er' fee.

    If ecr por

ACT IV. SCENE 1.

A  n Wemner

Ener wo GENTLEMEN, ng e r

      row;
    T, generl joy.

    I m u, hve n  full r royl mnd-

    Of hoe h clm r fce  dy,
    By cuom   r.

KING_HENRY_VIII|EPILOGUE
              THE EPILOGUE.

    'T en o e  ply cn n plee
    All h  . So  o ke r ee
    And leep n c  wo;  hoe,  fer,
    W'hve frghed wh  rump; o, ' cler,
    Ty'll y ' ugh; or o r  cy
    Abu'd ly, nd o cry 'Th' wy!'
    Wch  hve  ne n; h, I fer,
    All  peced od w' lke o r
    F  ply     ly n
    T rcful nruc  od w;
    F uch  e  'd 'em. If y mle
    And y 'wll , I  wn  wle
    All   n  ;  ' ll hp
    If y h wn r lde bd 'em clp.

THE END

1597

KING JOHN

    MELUN,  Fnch ld

      nd nece o Kng Jn

ACT III. SCENE 1.

    And brng o  brh cellence

THE TRAGEDY OF KING LEAR

ACT II. SCENE I.

T pr

    Wh' y nd h'   ll hould .

THE END

1596

A MIDSUMMER NIGHT'S DREAM

 Wllm Shkee



DRAMATIS PERSONAE

  THESEUS, Duke  An
  EGEUS, fr o Herm
  LYSANDER, n love wh Herm
  DEMETRIUS, n love wh Herm
  PHILOSTRATE, Mer   Revel o Teu
  QUINCE,  crpener
  SNUG,  jer
  BOTTOM,  w
  FLUTE,  llow-nder
  SNOUT,  nker
  STARVELING,  l

  HIPPOLYTA, Queen   Amz, hrod o Teu
  HERMIA, dugher o Egeu, n love wh Lynder
  HELENA, n love wh Demru

  OBERON, Kng   F
  TITANIA, Queen   F
  PUCK,  ROBIN GOODFELLOW
  PEASEBLOSSOM, fry  
  COBWEB, fry
  MOTH, fry
  MUSTARDSEED, fry

  PROLOGUE, PYRAMUS, THISBY, WALL, MOONSHINE, LION  pened :
    QUINCE, BOTTOM, FLUTE, SNOUT, STARVELING, AND SNUG

  Or F endng r Kng nd Queen
  Aendn  Teu nd Hppoly

ACT IV. SCENE I.
T wood. LYSANDER, DEMETRIUS, HELENA, nd HERMIA, lyng leep

Ener TITANIA nd Boom; PEASEBLOSSOM, COBWEB, MOTH, MUSTARDSEED,
nd or FAIRIES endng;

    Wle I hy mble cek  y,

MUCH ADO ABOUT NOTHING

ACT II. SCENE I.
A ep n Cypru. An open plce ner  quy.

ACT III. SCENE I.
BOLINGBROKE'S cmp  Brol

Ener BOLINGBROKE, YORK, NORTHUMBERLAND, PERCY, ROSS, WILLOUGHBY,
BUSHY nd GREEN, prer

  BOLINGBROKE. Brng h e n.
    Buhy nd Gen, I wll  v y oul-
    Snce penly y oul  pr y bode-
    Wh oo  urgng y ncou lve,
    F '  chry; y, o wh y blood
    From f  hnd,  n  vew  n
    I wll f o cue  y dh:
    You hve mled  prnce,  royl kng,
    A hppy genlemn n blood nd lnen,

THE END

PERSONAL USE ONLY, AND (2) ARE NOT DISTRIBUTED OR USED

SERVICE THAT CHARGES FOR DOWNLOAD TIME OR FOR MEMBERSHIP.>>

ACT IV. SCENE 1.

Ln. Bee  Tor

Ener QUEEN ELIZABETH, DUCHESS  YORK, nd MARQUIS  DORSET,  e ;

                        THE PROLOGUE

                        Ener Chu.

  Ch. Two houeh,  lke n dgny,
    In fr Ver, w  ly  cene,
    From ncen grudge bk o  my,
    W cvl blood mke cvl hnd clen.
    From h  fl l  e wo foe
    A pr  r-cro'd l ke r lfe;
    Whoe mdvenur'd peou hrow
    Doh wh r dh bury r pn' rfe.
    T ferful pge  r dh-mrk'd love,
    And  nnce  r pn' rge,
    Wch,  r cldn' end, nugh uld move,
    I w  wo h' rffc   ge;
    T wch f  wh pen er end,
    Wh  hll m,  ol hll rve o nd.

ACT I. Scene I.
Ver. A publc plce.

Ener Smp nd Gry (wh wd nd buckler)   houe  Cpul.

  Smp. Gry,   wd, 'll  crry l.
  Gr. No,  n  hould  ller.
  Smp. I n, n   n choler, 'll drw.
  Gr. Ay, wle  lve, drw y neck   llr.
  Smp. I rke quckly, ng moved.
  Gr. Bu hou r  quckly moved o rke.
  Smp. A g   houe  Mgue move .
  Gr. To move  o r, nd o  vln  o nd.
    Te, f hou r moved, hou rn' wy.
  Smp. A g  h houe hll move  o nd. I wll ke 
    wll  ny mn  md  Mgue'.
  Gr. Th  e  k lve;   ke e o 
    wll.
  Smp. 'T rue; nd e w, ng  ker veel, 
     hru o  wll. Te I wll puh Mgue' n
      wll nd hru  md o  wll.
  Gr. T qurl  en  mer nd u r n.  
  Smp. 'T ll e. I wll  elf  yrn. Wn I hve f
    wh  n, I wll  cruel wh  md- I wll cu f
    r d.
  Gr. T d   md?
  Smp. Ay,  d   md,  r mdend.
    Tke  n wh ene hou wl.
  Gr. Ty  ke  n ene h feel .

ACT V. Scene I.
Mnu. A .

Ener Roo.

THE END

SCENE III.

ACT III. SCENE 1

Bee PROSPERO'S cell

Ener FERDINAND, rng  log

    lb

Bee PROSPERO'S cell

ACT IV. SCENE I.
Wh  wll  An

Ener TIMON

  TIMON. L   bck  e. O hou wll
    Th gle n hoe wolve, dve n  erh
    And fence  An! Mr, urn nnnen.
    Odence, fl n cldn! Slve nd fool,
    Pluck  grve wrnkled Sene   nch
    And mner n r ed. To generl flh
    Cver, o' h' nn, gen vrgny.
    Do' n y pn' eye. Bnkr, h f;
    Rr hn nder bck,  wh y knve
    And cu y ruer' hro. Bod ervn, el:
    Lrge-hnded robr y grve mer ,
    And pll  lw. Md, o hy mer' d:
    Thy m  o' h' brol. S  xeen,
    Pluck  ln'd cruch  hy  lmpng ,
    Wh     brn. Py nd fer,
    Relg o  d, pece, ce, ruh,
    Doc , ngh-, nd neghbhood,  
    Inruc, mnner, e, nd e,
    De, obervnce, cuom nd lw,
    Declne o y nfodng nr
    And l nfu lve. Plgue ncden o n,
    Y poen nd nfecou f p
    On An, rpe  . Thou ld cc,
    Crpple  en, h r lmb  hl
    A lly  r mnner. Lu nd lry,
    Cep n  mnd nd mrrow   yh,
    Th 'gn  m  vrue y  rve
    And dr melve n ro. Ic, bln,
    Sow ll h' Ann boom, nd r crop
    Be generl leproy! Brh nfec brh,
    Th r ocy,  r fndp, 
    Be ly po! Nong I'll r  e
    Bu nkedne, hou deble !

    A ve nr.

ACT V. SCENE I.
Pln ner Ro

Ener LUCIUS wh n r  GOTHS wh drum nd l

  LUCIUS. Approved wrr nd  fhful fnd,

    Wch gnfe wh he y r r Em
    And  derou   gh y .
    Te, gr ld, ,  y le wne,

    Th I pr o Ro, I m nen.

ACT V. SCENE 1.
T Gcn cmp. Bee  en  ACHILLES

    Thou cruy bch  nu, wh'  ?

1611

THE WINTER'S TALE

 Wllm Shkee



Drm Pere

SCENE III.
Scl. A chpel n PAULINA' houe

Ener LEONTES, POLIXENES, FLORIZEL, PERDITA, CAMILLO, PAULINA,
LORDS nd ATTENDANTS

    Th I hve hd  e!

1609

A LOVER'S COMPLAINT

 Wllm Shkee



  From f  ll e ncve womb wded
  A plnful y   'rng vle,
  My pr 'end  uble voce ced,
  And wn I ld o l  d-ed le,
  E lg eped  fckle md full ple,
  Terng  p, bkng rng wn,
  Smng r wld wh row' wnd nd rn.

  Up r d  pled ve  rw,
  Wch fed r vge   ,
  W  h mgh nk om  w
  T crce   uy pen nd ne.
  T hd  cyd ll h yh g,
  N yh ll qu,  pe  h' fell rge
  So uy peeped hrough lce  ed ge.

  Of   ve r npkn o r eyne,
  Wch   hd nceed chrcer,
  Ld'rng  lken fgu n  brne
  Th eed woe hd pelled n er,
  And en dng wh nen  r;  
  A en hkng dngud woe,
  In clm  ll ze,  gh nd low.

  Som r levelled eye r crrge e,
  A y  b'ry o  p nend;
  Som dvered r po bll  ed
  To h' d erh; om y  end
  Tr vew rgh ; n r gze lend
  To y plce  ce, nd w fxed,
  T mnd nd gh drcedly mmxed.

  Her r, r looe r ed n ml pl,
  Procld n r  c hnd  pe;
  F o, ucked, decended r ved h,
  Hngng r ple nd pned cek de;
  So n r hden fll ll  bde,
  And, rue o bdge,   bk  nce,
  Though lckly bed n looe nlgence.

  A hod fv   md  dw  
  Of mr, cryl, nd  ded j,
  Wch e  e  n  rver hw,
  Up e epng mrgen  w ;
  Lke uury pplyng w o w,
  Or mrch' hnd h l  boy fll
  W wn c o,  w ce g ll.

  Of fed chle hd  mny  e,
  Wch  ued, gd, e, nd gve  flood;
  Crcked mny  rng  poed ld nd be,
  Bddng m fnd r epulch n mud;
  Fod y moe ler dly penned n blood,
  Wh leded lk f nd ffecedly
  Enwd nd eled o curou eccy.

  Te en bd  n r fluxve eye,
  And en ked, nd en 'gn o er;
  Cd, 'O fle blood, hou rer  le,
  Wh pproved wne  hou r!
  Ink  hve eed  blck nd dmned !  
  T d, n op  rge  lne  n,
  Bg dnen o bkng r nen.

  A nd mn h grzed  cle ngh,
  Som  bluer h  ruffle k
  Of ur,  cy, nd hd l  
  T wfe h oberved  y flew,
  Tow  fflced fncy fly dw;
  And, prvled  ge, de o 
  In   grod nd move  r woe.

  So lde  wn   grned b,
  And ly dn    r de;
  Wn  gn de r, ng ,
  Her gvnce wh  rng o dvde.
  If h  m    ugh ppled
  Wch  r ufferng ecy uge,
  'T promed n  chry  ge.

  'Fr,'  y, 'hough n   h  
  T njury  mny  blng h,
  L   ell y judgen I m :
  No ge,  row,   hh por.
  I mgh  y hve en  pdng flor,
  Fh o elf, f I hd elf-ppled
  Love o elf, nd o  love de.

  'Bu woe  ! oo erly I ended
  A yhful u-  w o gn  grce-
  O, e  nu' w o mnded
  Th mden' eye uck  ll  fce.
  Love lcked  dllng nd mde m r plce;
  And wn n  fr pr   bde,
  S w  lodged nd ly defed.

  'H bry lock  hng n croed curl;
  And y lgh occ   wnd
  Up  lp r lken prcel hurl.
  Wh'  o , o  wll ply fnd:
  Ech eye h w m  enchn  mnd;  
  F   vge w n lle drwn
  Wh lrgene nk n Pe w wn.

  'Smll   mn w y   cn;
  H phoenx wn gn  o p,
  Lke hn velv,  h erm kn,
  Whoe b -brgged  b  eed o r:
  Y ed  vge  h   der;
  And nce ffec wverng ood n ub
  If     w,   wh.

  'H qule  ueou   m,
  F mden-gued  w, nd  fe;
  Y f n moved m, w  uch  m
  A  'wx My nd Aprl  o ee,
  Wn wnd br , ruly hough y .
  H rudene o wh  uhzed yh
  Dd l flene n  pe  ruh.

  'Well uld  e, nd en n  y,  
  "Th he  mle   er ke:
  Proud  ubjec, ble   wy,
  Wh rod, wh bod, wh ure, wh op  mke!"
  And nry nce   ke
  Whr  he  m c  deed,
  Or   mnge  h' ll-ng eed.

  'Bu quckly   de  vec n:
  H l hbude gve lfe nd grce
  To pnng nd o nn,
  Acmpld n melf,  n  ce,
  All d, melve mde fr  r plce,
  C  dd; y r purpoed rm
  Perced   grce,   ll grced  m.

  'So   p   ubdg gue
  All knd  rg nd  deep,
  All plc promp, nd  rg,
  F  dvnge ll  wke nd leep.
  To mke  e lugh,  lugr ep,  
  He hd  dlec nd  kll,
  Ccng ll p n  crf  wll,

  'Th   n  generl boom gn
  Of yog,  , nd e  enchned,
  To dll wh m n h,  o mn
  In l duy,  w  hed.
  Cen wcd, e  de, hve grned,
  And dlogued  m wh   y,
  Aked r  wll, nd mde r wll oy.

  'Mny   h   pcu g,
  To erve r eye, nd n  pu r mnd;
  Lke fool h n h' mgn 
  T odly objec wch brod y fnd
  Of lnd nd mn, r n h gned;
  And lbng n moe pleu o ow m
  Thn  rue uy lndld wch h o m.

  'So mny hve, h n oucd  hnd,  
  Sly poed m m   r.
  My woeful elf, h  n fem nd,
  And w   fee-mple,  n pr,
  Wh wh  r n yh, nd yh n r,
  Thw  ffec n  ch por
  Reerved  lk nd gve m ll  flor.

  'Y  I ,  o  equl ,
  Demnd  m, r ng ded yelded;
  Fndng elf n h o bd,
  Wh fe dnce I mne h elded.
  Exence   mny bulwrk bulded
  Of pro -bleedng, wch mned  fol
  Of  fle jel, nd  mou pol.

  'Bu h,   hned  pceden
  T dened ll   relf y?
  Or ced mple, 'gn r  nen,
  To pu  -p l n r wy?
  Coel  op wle wh wll  y;  
  F wn  rge, dvce  en een
  By blng u o mke  wll  keen.

  'N   fc o  blood
  Th   curb   or' pro,
  To  bod   h eem o od
  F fer  hrm h pch n  ho.
  O ppe,  judgen nd lo!
  T e  ple hh h  wll e,
  Though Re ep, nd cry   hy l.

  'F  I uld y  mn' rue,
  And k  pern   foul gulng;
  He w  pln n or' ch gw;
  Sw  dece  glded n  mlng;
  K vow   br o deflng;
  Th chrcer nd wd ly  r,
  And b   foul dulere r.

  'And lg  e erm I ld  cy,  
  Tll hu  'gn e : "Genle md,
  Hve   ufferng yh o feelng py,
  And     holy vow f.
  Th' o ye wn o ne w  d;
  F fe  love I hve en clled o,
  Tll w  ne'er nve r n woo.

  '"All  fence h brod  ee
  A err   blood, ne   mnd;
  Love mde m ; wh cu y  ,
  W n pry  r rue r knd.
  Ty  r h h o r h  fnd;
  And o    h n  mn
  By     r proch nn.

  '"Amg  mny h mne eye hve een,
  No e e fl  r o   w,
  Or  ffec pu o h' ml een,
  Or ny   leu  ch.
  Hrm hve I ne o m,  ne'er w h;  
  Kep r n lve,  mne  w fe,
  And gned mmndng n  mrchy.

  '"Lo  wh  woded fnce en ,
  Of pled l nd rube d  blood;
  Fgurng h y r p lke len 
  Of gf nd blu, ply derood
  In blood  nd  encrmed mood-
  Effec  err nd der modey,
  Encmped n r,  fghng wly.

  '"And, lo, h e len  r r,
  Wh d ml mouly emplecd,
  I hve cev'd  mny  l fr,
  Tr knd ccepnce epngly eecd,
  Wh  nn  fr gem enrcd,
  And deep-brned n h  mplfy
  Ech e' der nu, wh, nd quly.

  '"T dmd? , 'w uful nd h,  
  Wro  nved proe  end;
  T deep-gen em'rld, n e fh r
  Wek gh r ckly nce  nd;
  T h-hued pp nd  opl blend
  Wh objec mnf; ech l e,
  Wh w ll blzed, mled,  mde o m.

  '"Lo, ll e rope  ffec ho,
  Of penved nd ubdued de  ender,
  Nu hh chrged  h I hd m ,
  Bu yeld m  w I elf  nder-
  Th , o ,  gn nd ender;
  F e,  ce,  y obl ,
  Snce I r lr,  enpr .

  '"O n dvnce  y h phre hnd
  Whoe  gh wn  ry cle  pre;
  Tke ll e mle o y  mmnd,
  Hllod wh gh h burnng lg  re;
  Wh  y mner   oy  
  Wk der ; nd o y ud 
  Tr drc prcel n mbned um.

  '"Lo,  devce w en    n,
  Or er ncfed,  ho e,
  Wch le r ble u n ur  h,
  Whoe r hvng mde  bloom e;
  F  w   pr  rc ,
  Bu  ld dnce, nd  nce move
  To pend r lvng n ernl love.

  '"Bu, O  , wh lb ' o leve
  T ng  hve , m'rng wh  rve,
  Plyng  plce wch   m ceve,
  Plyng pen p n nrned gyve!
  S h r f o o relf nrve,
  T cr  ble cph   flgh,
  And mke r bence vln,  r mgh.

  '"O prn  n h  bo  rue!  
  T ccden wch br  o r eye
  Up  m  r ce ubdue,
  And w    cged cloer fly.
  Relgou love pu  lg' eye.
  No o  emped,    mmud,
  And w o emp ll lry procud.

  '"How mghy n  , O r  ell!
  T bn boom h o  lg
  Hve emped ll r fon n  ll,
  And mne I p y ocen ll mg.
  I rg o'er m, nd  o'er  ng rg,
  Mu  y vcy u ll nge,
  A mpod love o phyc y ld b.

  '"My pr hd pow'r o chrm  cd n,
  Who, dcplned, y, ded n grce,
  Beleved r eye wn y 'l g,
  All vow nd necr gvng plce,
  O  poenl love, vow, bd, r pce,  
  In e hh n ng, k, r nfne,
  F hou r ll, nd ll ng   ne.

  '"Wn hou mpe, wh  pcep wh
  Of le mple? Wn hou wl nfl,
  How ldly hoe mpedn nd h,
  Of lh,  fll fer, lw, kndd, f!
  Love' rm  pece, 'gn rule, 'gn ene, 'gn h.
  And en, n  uff'rng png  r,
  T loe  ll ce, hock nd fer.

  '"Now ll e r h   mne depend,
  Feelng  bk, wh bleedng gr y pne,
  And plcn r gh o y end,
  To leve  b'ry h  mke 'gn mne,
  Lendng  udence o   degn,
  And cden oul o h rg-bded oh,
  Th hll pfer nd derke  roh."

  'T d,  w'ry eye   dmo,  
  Whoe gh ll n  levelled   fce;
  Ech cek  rver rnng   fo
  Wh brnh curn wnw flod pce.
  O,   chnnel o  m gve grce!
  Who glzed wh cryl ge  glg roe
  Th fl hrough r wch r hue encloe.

  'O fr, wh  ll  wchcrf le
  In  mll b  e prculr er!
  Bu wh  nd   eye
  Wh rocky r o r wll  r?
  Wh b o ld h   w ?
  O clef effec! ld modey, ho wrh,
  Boh f  nce nd cll ncu hh.

  'F lo,  p,  n r  crf,
  Even  olved   no er;
  T   ole  chy I dffed,
  Sho f   gu nd cvl fer;
  Ap o m   o  p,  
  All lng; hough  drop  dff'nce be:
  H poed , nd mne  m e.

  'In m  plenude  uble mer,
  Appled o cuel, ll rnge m ceve,
  Of burnng blu   epng r,
  Or wong plene; nd  ke nd leve,
  In ' pne,    deceve,
  To bluh  peec rnk, o ep  woe,
  Or o urn  nd wo  rgc ;

  'Th   r wch n  level c
  Could cpe  l   ll-hurng m,
  Sng fr nu   knd nd ;
  And, veled n m,  wn m   mm.
  Agn  ng     clm;
  Wn   burned n r-wd luxury,
  He pcd pu md nd pred ld chy.

  'Thu ly wh  grn   Grce  
  T nked nd nceled fend  ved,
  Th h' en gve  emper plce,
  Wch, lke  crubn, bove m hed.
  Who, yog nd mple,    o led?
  Ay , I fell, nd y   mke
  Wh I hould  gn  uch  ke.

  'O, h nfeced u   eye,
  O, h fle f wch n  cek o glod,
  O, h ced hder   r  fly,
  O, h d brh  pgy lg od,
  O, ll h brod mo, eemng od,
  Would y gn ry  e-ryed,
  And  ver  ncled md.'

THE END
